item.title: Beyond the Algorithm: Why I Built igluon.org for the @igluonvinuls Community
item.description:
Beyond the Algorithm: Why I Built igluon.org for the @igluonvinuls Community

I’ll be honest: I am fed up with the “YouTube Maze.”

As a creator, I want my content to be accessible, organized, and easy to find. But as a user, I’ve realized that YouTube’s interface has become a barrier. Between the cluttered sidebars, the broken playlist navigation, and an algorithm that pushes unrelated videos when you’re trying to focus, the experience of watching @igluonvinuls wasn’t what it should be.

item.title: Building Scalable and Resilient Cloud Applications
item.description: I recently had the privilege of presenting to the Developer Collaboration group at UC Santa Barbara, a gathering of both Software Developers and Infrastructure Engineers. The topic was Cloud Native Application Development, but the underlying theme was much deeper: the urgent need to bridge the historical divide between those who write the code and those who manage the systems that run it.
